alert.note: Alert for Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 7:59AM CDT until May 09 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rawlins County in northwestern Kansas... Decatur County in northwestern Kansas... Southern Red Willow County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Hitchcock County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 759 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Herndon, or 14 miles northeast of Atwood, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Danbury and Lebanon. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
